    height: 40px;

    display: none;

    display: block;

    display: block;
  }

    display: block;
  }

    padding-top: 40px;
    padding-left: 0;

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/directive.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="directive GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>directive</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="directives" class="anchor" href="directive.html#directives" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Directives</h1>
<p>Directives provide a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.</p>
<p>For more information, see <a href="https://graphql.github.io/graphql-spec/draft/#sec-Language.Directives">the GraphQL spec</a>.</p>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="deprecated GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>deprecated</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="deprecated" class="anchor" href="index.html#deprecated" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>deprecated</h1>
<p>Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.</p>
<h2 id="locations">
<a id="locations" class="anchor" href="index.html#locations" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Locations</h2>
<ul>
  <li>FIELD_DEFINITION</li>
  <li>ENUM_VALUE</li>
  <li>ARGUMENT_DEFINITION</li>
  <li>INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION</li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="arguments" class="anchor" href="index.html#arguments" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Arguments</h2>
<table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">reason</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted in <a href="https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/">Markdown</a>.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/directive/include/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="include GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>include</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="include" class="anchor" href="index.html#include" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>include</h1>
<p>Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the <code>if</code> argument is true.</p>
<h2 id="locations">
<a id="locations" class="anchor" href="index.html#locations" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Locations</h2>
<ul>
  <li>FIELD</li>
  <li>FRAGMENT_SPREAD</li>
  <li>INLINE_FRAGMENT</li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="arguments" class="anchor" href="index.html#arguments" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Arguments</h2>
<table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">if</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Included when true.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/directive/oneof/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="oneOf GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>oneOf</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="oneof" class="anchor" href="index.html#oneof" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>oneOf</h1>
<p>Requires that exactly one field must be supplied and that field must not be <code>null</code>.</p>
<h2 id="locations">
<a id="locations" class="anchor" href="index.html#locations" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Locations</h2>
<ul>
  <li>INPUT_OBJECT</li>
</ul>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="skip GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>skip</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="skip" class="anchor" href="index.html#skip" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>skip</h1>
<p>Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the <code>if</code> argument is true.</p>
<h2 id="locations">
<a id="locations" class="anchor" href="index.html#locations" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Locations</h2>
<ul>
  <li>FIELD</li>
  <li>FRAGMENT_SPREAD</li>
  <li>INLINE_FRAGMENT</li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="arguments" class="anchor" href="index.html#arguments" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Arguments</h2>
<table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">if</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Skipped when true.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/directive/specifiedby/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="specifiedBy GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>specifiedBy</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="specifiedby" class="anchor" href="index.html#specifiedby" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>specifiedBy</h1>
<p>Exposes a URL that specifies the behavior of this scalar.</p>
<h2 id="locations">
<a id="locations" class="anchor" href="index.html#locations" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Locations</h2>
<ul>
  <li>SCALAR</li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="arguments" class="anchor" href="index.html#arguments" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Arguments</h2>
<table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">url</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>The URL that specifies the behavior of this scalar.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/enum.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="enum GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>enum</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="enums" class="anchor" href="enum.html#enums" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Enums</h1>
<p>Enums represent a possible set of values for a field. For example, the <code>Issue</code> object has a field called <code>state</code>. The state of an issue may be <code>OPEN</code> or <code>CLOSED</code>.</p>
<p>For more information, see <a href="http://spec.graphql.org/draft/#sec-Enums">the GraphQL spec</a>.</p>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__DirectiveLocation GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__DirectiveLocation</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="__directivelocation" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#__directivelocation" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__DirectiveLocation</h1>
<p>A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.</p>
<h3 id="values">
<a id="values" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#values" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Values</h3>
  <h4 id="query" class="name anchored">
<a id="query" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#query" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>QUERY</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a query operation.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="mutation" class="name anchored">
<a id="mutation" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#mutation" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>MUTATION</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a mutation operation.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="subscription" class="name anchored">
<a id="subscription" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#subscription" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>SUBSCRIPTION</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a subscription operation.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="field" class="name anchored">
<a id="field" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#field" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>FIELD</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a field.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="fragment_definition" class="name anchored">
<a id="fragment_definition" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#fragment_definition" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>FRAGMENT_DEFINITION</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a fragment definition.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="fragment_spread" class="name anchored">
<a id="fragment_spread" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#fragment_spread" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>FRAGMENT_SPREAD</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a fragment spread.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="inline_fragment" class="name anchored">
<a id="inline_fragment" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#inline_fragment" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>INLINE_FRAGMENT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to an inline fragment.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="schema" class="name anchored">
<a id="schema" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#schema" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>SCHEMA</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a schema definition.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="scalar" class="name anchored">
<a id="scalar" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#scalar" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>SCALAR</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a scalar definition.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="object" class="name anchored">
<a id="object" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#object" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>OBJECT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to an object type definition.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="field_definition" class="name anchored">
<a id="field_definition" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#field_definition" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>FIELD_DEFINITION</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a field definition.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="argument_definition" class="name anchored">
<a id="argument_definition" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#argument_definition" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>ARGUMENT_DEFINITION</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to an argument definition.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="interface" class="name anchored">
<a id="interface" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#interface" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>INTERFACE</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to an interface definition.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="union" class="name anchored">
<a id="union" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#union" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>UNION</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a union definition.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="enum" class="name anchored">
<a id="enum" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#enum" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>ENUM</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to an enum definition.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="enum_value" class="name anchored">
<a id="enum_value" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#enum_value" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>ENUM_VALUE</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to an enum value definition.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="input_object" class="name anchored">
<a id="input_object" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#input_object" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>INPUT_OBJECT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to an input object type definition.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="input_field_definition" class="name anchored">
<a id="input_field_definition" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#input_field_definition" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to an input object field definition.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="variable_definition" class="name anchored">
<a id="variable_definition" class="anchor" href="__directivelocation.html#variable_definition" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>VARIABLE_DEFINITION</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a variable definition.</p>
  </div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__DirectiveLocation GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__DirectiveLocation</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      </li>
      
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

      </div>
      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="__directivelocation" class="anchor" href="../__directivelocation.html#__directivelocation" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__DirectiveLocation</h1>
<p>A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.</p>
<h3 id="values">
<a id="values" class="anchor" href="../__directivelocation.html#values" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Values</h3>
  <h4 id="query" class="name anchored">
<a id="query" class="anchor" href="../__directivelocation.html#query" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>QUERY</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a query operation.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="mutation" class="name anchored">
<a id="mutation" class="anchor" href="../__directivelocation.html#mutation" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>MUTATION</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a mutation operation.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="subscription" class="name anchored">
<a id="subscription" class="anchor" href="../__directivelocation.html#subscription" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>SUBSCRIPTION</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Location adjacent to a subscription operation.</p>
  </div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__TypeKind GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__TypeKind</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="__typekind" class="anchor" href="__typekind.html#__typekind" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__TypeKind</h1>
<p>An enum describing what kind of type a given <code>__Type</code> is.</p>
<h3 id="values">
<a id="values" class="anchor" href="__typekind.html#values" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Values</h3>
  <h4 id="scalar" class="name anchored">
<a id="scalar" class="anchor" href="__typekind.html#scalar" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>SCALAR</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is a scalar.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="object" class="name anchored">
<a id="object" class="anchor" href="__typekind.html#object" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>OBJECT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is an object. <code>fields</code> and <code>interfaces</code> are valid fields.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="interface" class="name anchored">
<a id="interface" class="anchor" href="__typekind.html#interface" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>INTERFACE</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is an interface. <code>fields</code> and <code>possibleTypes</code> are valid fields.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="union" class="name anchored">
<a id="union" class="anchor" href="__typekind.html#union" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>UNION</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is a union. <code>possibleTypes</code> is a valid field.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="enum" class="name anchored">
<a id="enum" class="anchor" href="__typekind.html#enum" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>ENUM</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is an enum. <code>enumValues</code> is a valid field.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="input_object" class="name anchored">
<a id="input_object" class="anchor" href="__typekind.html#input_object" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>INPUT_OBJECT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is an input object. <code>inputFields</code> is a valid field.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="list" class="name anchored">
<a id="list" class="anchor" href="__typekind.html#list" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>LIST</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is a list. <code>ofType</code> is a valid field.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="non_null" class="name anchored">
<a id="non_null" class="anchor" href="__typekind.html#non_null" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>NON_NULL</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is a non-null. <code>ofType</code> is a valid field.</p>
  </div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>

        </a>

  </body>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__TypeKind GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__TypeKind</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="__typekind" class="anchor" href="../__typekind.html#__typekind" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__TypeKind</h1>
<p>An enum describing what kind of type a given <code>__Type</code> is.</p>
<h3 id="values">
<a id="values" class="anchor" href="../__typekind.html#values" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Values</h3>
  <h4 id="scalar" class="name anchored">
<a id="scalar" class="anchor" href="../__typekind.html#scalar" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>SCALAR</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is a scalar.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="object" class="name anchored">
<a id="object" class="anchor" href="../__typekind.html#object" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>OBJECT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is an object. <code>fields</code> and <code>interfaces</code> are valid fields.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="interface" class="name anchored">
<a id="interface" class="anchor" href="../__typekind.html#interface" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>INTERFACE</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is an interface. <code>fields</code> and <code>possibleTypes</code> are valid fields.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="union" class="name anchored">
<a id="union" class="anchor" href="../__typekind.html#union" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>UNION</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is a union. <code>possibleTypes</code> is a valid field.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="enum" class="name anchored">
<a id="enum" class="anchor" href="../__typekind.html#enum" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>ENUM</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is an enum. <code>enumValues</code> is a valid field.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="input_object" class="name anchored">
<a id="input_object" class="anchor" href="../__typekind.html#input_object" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>INPUT_OBJECT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is an input object. <code>inputFields</code> is a valid field.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="list" class="name anchored">
<a id="list" class="anchor" href="../__typekind.html#list" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>LIST</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is a list. <code>ofType</code> is a valid field.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="non_null" class="name anchored">
<a id="non_null" class="anchor" href="../__typekind.html#non_null" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>NON_NULL</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Indicates this type is a non-null. <code>ofType</code> is a valid field.</p>
  </div>

      </div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="CollectionsOrder GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>CollectionsOrder</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="collectionsorder" class="anchor" href="collectionsorder.html#collectionsorder" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>CollectionsOrder</h1>
<h3 id="values">
<a id="values" class="anchor" href="collectionsorder.html#values" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Values</h3>
  <h4 id="featured_at" class="name anchored">
<a id="featured_at" class="anchor" href="collectionsorder.html#featured_at" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>FEATURED_AT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Collections in descending order of featured date.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="followers_count" class="name anchored">
<a id="followers_count" class="anchor" href="collectionsorder.html#followers_count" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>FOLLOWERS_COUNT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Collections in descending order of followers count.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="newest" class="name anchored">
<a id="newest" class="anchor" href="collectionsorder.html#newest" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>NEWEST</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Collections in descending order of creation date.</p>
  </div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

      </div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/enum/collectionsorder/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="CollectionsOrder GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>CollectionsOrder</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="collectionsorder" class="anchor" href="../collectionsorder.html#collectionsorder" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>CollectionsOrder</h1>

  <h4 id="featured_at" class="name anchored">
<a id="featured_at" class="anchor" href="../collectionsorder.html#featured_at" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>FEATURED_AT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Collections in descending order of featured date.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="followers_count" class="name anchored">
<a id="followers_count" class="anchor" href="../collectionsorder.html#followers_count" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>FOLLOWERS_COUNT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="CommentsOrder GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>CommentsOrder</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="commentsorder" class="anchor" href="commentsorder.html#commentsorder" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>CommentsOrder</h1>
<h3 id="values">
<a id="values" class="anchor" href="commentsorder.html#values" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Values</h3>
  <h4 id="newest" class="name anchored">
<a id="newest" class="anchor" href="commentsorder.html#newest" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>NEWEST</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Comments in descending order of creation date.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="votes_count" class="name anchored">
<a id="votes_count" class="anchor" href="commentsorder.html#votes_count" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>VOTES_COUNT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Comments in descending order of votes count.</p>
  </div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/enum/commentsorder/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="CommentsOrder GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>CommentsOrder</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="commentsorder" class="anchor" href="../commentsorder.html#commentsorder" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>CommentsOrder</h1>
<h3 id="values">
<a id="values" class="anchor" href="../commentsorder.html#values" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Values</h3>
  <h4 id="newest" class="name anchored">
<a id="newest" class="anchor" href="../commentsorder.html#newest" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>NEWEST</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Comments in descending order of creation date.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="votes_count" class="name anchored">
<a id="votes_count" class="anchor" href="../commentsorder.html#votes_count" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>VOTES_COUNT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Comments in descending order of votes count.</p>
  </div>

        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/enum/postsorder.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="PostsOrder GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>PostsOrder</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="postsorder" class="anchor" href="postsorder.html#postsorder" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>PostsOrder</h1>
<h3 id="values">
<a id="values" class="anchor" href="postsorder.html#values" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Values</h3>
  <h4 id="featured_at" class="name anchored">
<a id="featured_at" class="anchor" href="postsorder.html#featured_at" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>FEATURED_AT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Posts in descending order of featured date.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="newest" class="name anchored">
<a id="newest" class="anchor" href="postsorder.html#newest" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>NEWEST</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Posts in descending order of creation date.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="ranking" class="name anchored">
<a id="ranking" class="anchor" href="postsorder.html#ranking" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>RANKING</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Posts in descending order of ranking.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="votes" class="name anchored">
<a id="votes" class="anchor" href="postsorder.html#votes" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>VOTES</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Posts in descending order of votes count.</p>
  </div>

      </div>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="postsorder" class="anchor" href="../postsorder.html#postsorder" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>PostsOrder</h1>
<h3 id="values">
<a id="values" class="anchor" href="../postsorder.html#values" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Values</h3>
  <h4 id="featured_at" class="name anchored">
<a id="featured_at" class="anchor" href="../postsorder.html#featured_at" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>FEATURED_AT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Posts in descending order of featured date.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="newest" class="name anchored">
<a id="newest" class="anchor" href="../postsorder.html#newest" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>NEWEST</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Posts in descending order of creation date.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="ranking" class="name anchored">
<a id="ranking" class="anchor" href="../postsorder.html#ranking" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>RANKING</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Posts in descending order of ranking.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="votes" class="name anchored">
<a id="votes" class="anchor" href="../postsorder.html#votes" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>VOTES</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Posts in descending order of votes count.</p>
  </div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/enum/topicsorder.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="TopicsOrder GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>TopicsOrder</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="topicsorder" class="anchor" href="topicsorder.html#topicsorder" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>TopicsOrder</h1>
<h3 id="values">
<a id="values" class="anchor" href="topicsorder.html#values" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Values</h3>
  <h4 id="followers_count" class="name anchored">
<a id="followers_count" class="anchor" href="topicsorder.html#followers_count" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>FOLLOWERS_COUNT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Topics in descending order of followers count.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="newest" class="name anchored">
<a id="newest" class="anchor" href="topicsorder.html#newest" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>NEWEST</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Topics in descending order of creation date.</p>
  </div>
