===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/enum/topicsorder/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="TopicsOrder GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>TopicsOrder</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="topicsorder" class="anchor" href="../topicsorder.html#topicsorder" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>TopicsOrder</h1>
<h3 id="values">
<a id="values" class="anchor" href="../topicsorder.html#values" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Values</h3>
  <h4 id="followers_count" class="name anchored">
<a id="followers_count" class="anchor" href="../topicsorder.html#followers_count" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>FOLLOWERS_COUNT</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Topics in descending order of followers count.</p>
  </div>
  <h4 id="newest" class="name anchored">
<a id="newest" class="anchor" href="../topicsorder.html#newest" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>NEWEST</h4>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Returns Topics in descending order of creation date.</p>
  </div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="index GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>index</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/input_object.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="input_object GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>input_object</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="input-objects" class="anchor" href="input_object.html#input-objects" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Input Objects</h1>
<p>Input objects are best described as "composable objects" in that they contain a set of input fields that define a particular object. For example, the <code>AuthorInput</code> takes a field called <code>emails</code>. Providing a value for <code>emails</code> will transform the <code>AuthorInput</code> into a list of <code>User</code> objects which contain that email address/</p>
<p>For more information, see <a href="http://spec.graphql.org/draft/#sec-Input-Objects">the GraphQL spec</a>.</p>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/input_object/userfollowinput.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="UserFollowInput GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>UserFollowInput</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="userfollowinput" class="anchor" href="userfollowinput.html#userfollowinput" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>UserFollowInput</h1>
<p>Autogenerated input type of UserFollow</p>
<h2>
<a id="input-fields" class="anchor" href="userfollowinput.html#input-fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Input Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="clientmutationid" class="field-name anchored">clientMutationId (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A unique identifier for the client performing the mutation.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="userid" class="field-name anchored">userId (<code><a href="../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the User to follow.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/input_object/userfollowinput/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="UserFollowInput GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>UserFollowInput</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="userfollowinput" class="anchor" href="../userfollowinput.html#userfollowinput" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>UserFollowInput</h1>
<p>Autogenerated input type of UserFollow</p>
<h2>
<a id="input-fields" class="anchor" href="../userfollowinput.html#input-fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Input Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="clientmutationid" class="field-name anchored">clientMutationId (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A unique identifier for the client performing the mutation.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="userid" class="field-name anchored">userId (<code><a href="../../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the User to follow.</p>
  </div>
</div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/input_object/userfollowundoinput.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="UserFollowUndoInput GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>UserFollowUndoInput</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

<h2>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="UserFollowUndoInput GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>UserFollowUndoInput</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="userfollowundoinput" class="anchor" href="../userfollowundoinput.html#userfollowundoinput" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>UserFollowUndoInput</h1>
<p>Autogenerated input type of UserFollowUndo</p>
<h2>
<a id="input-fields" class="anchor" href="../userfollowundoinput.html#input-fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Input Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="clientmutationid" class="field-name anchored">clientMutationId (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A unique identifier for the client performing the mutation.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="userid" class="field-name anchored">userId (<code><a href="../../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the User to stop following.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="interface GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>interface</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="interfaces" class="anchor" href="interface.html#interfaces" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Interfaces</h1>
<p>GraphQL Interfaces are a sort of "parent object" from which other objects can "inherit" from. For example, <code>Stars</code> is considered an interface, because both <code>Repository</code> and <code>Gist</code> can be starred. An interface has its own list of named fields that are shared by implementing objects.</p>
<p>For more information, see <a href="http://spec.graphql.org/draft/#sec-Interfaces">the GraphQL spec</a>.</p>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="TopicableInterface GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>TopicableInterface</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="topicableinterface" class="anchor" href="topicableinterface.html#topicableinterface" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>TopicableInterface</h1>
<p>An object that can have topics associated with it.</p>
<h2>
<a id="implemented-by" class="anchor" href="topicableinterface.html#implemented-by" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Implemented by</h2>
<ul>
   <li><code><a href="../object/collection.html">Collection</a></code></li>
   <li><code><a href="../object/post.html">Post</a></code></li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="topicableinterface.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="id" class="field-name anchored">id (<code><a href="../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the object.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="TopicableInterface GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>TopicableInterface</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="topicableinterface" class="anchor" href="../topicableinterface.html#topicableinterface" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>TopicableInterface</h1>
<p>An object that can have topics associated with it.</p>
<h2>
<a id="implemented-by" class="anchor" href="../topicableinterface.html#implemented-by" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Implemented by</h2>
<ul>
   <li><code><a href="../../object/collection.html">Collection</a></code></li>
   <li><code><a href="../../object/post.html">Post</a></code></li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../topicableinterface.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="id" class="field-name anchored">id (<code><a href="../../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the object.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/interface/votableinterface.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="VotableInterface GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>VotableInterface</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="votableinterface" class="anchor" href="votableinterface.html#votableinterface" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>VotableInterface</h1>
<p>An object which users can vote for.</p>
<h2>
<a id="implemented-by" class="anchor" href="votableinterface.html#implemented-by" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Implemented by</h2>
<ul>
   <li><code><a href="../object/comment.html">Comment</a></code></li>
   <li><code><a href="../object/post.html">Post</a></code></li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="votableinterface.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="id" class="field-name anchored">id (<code><a href="../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the object</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="isvoted" class="field-name anchored">isVoted (<code><a href="../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Whether the Viewer has voted for the object or not.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="votescount" class="field-name anchored">votesCount (<code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Number of votes that the object has currently.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>

<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">

    <title>VotableInterface</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);

    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="votableinterface" class="anchor" href="../votableinterface.html#votableinterface" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>VotableInterface</h1>
<p>An object which users can vote for.</p>
<h2>
<a id="implemented-by" class="anchor" href="../votableinterface.html#implemented-by" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Implemented by</h2>
<ul>
   <li><code><a href="../../object/comment.html">Comment</a></code></li>
   <li><code><a href="../../object/post.html">Post</a></code></li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../votableinterface.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="id" class="field-name anchored">id (<code><a href="../../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the object</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="isvoted" class="field-name anchored">isVoted (<code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Whether the Viewer has voted for the object or not.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="votescount" class="field-name anchored">votesCount (<code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Number of votes that the object has currently.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/mutation/userfollow/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="userFollow GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>userFollow</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

        <h1>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/mutation/userfollowundo/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="userFollowUndo GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>userFollowUndo</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>

<a id="input-fields" class="anchor" href="index.html#input-fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Input fields</h2>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {

          if (contains) {

          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });

        <h1>
<a id="objects" class="anchor" href="object.html#objects" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Objects</h1>
<p>Objects in GraphQL represent the resources that you can access. Objects can contain a list of fields, which are specifically typed. For example, the <code>Repository</code> object has a field called <code>name</code>, which is a <code>String</code>.</p>
<p>For more information, see <a href="http://spec.graphql.org/draft/#sec-Objects">the GraphQL spec</a>.</p>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/__directive.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__Directive GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__Directive</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="__directive" class="anchor" href="__directive.html#__directive" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__Directive</h1>
<p>A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.</p>
<p>In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="__directive.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__Directive GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__Directive</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="__directive" class="anchor" href="../__directive.html#__directive" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__Directive</h1>
<p>A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.</p>
<p>In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../__directive.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="locations" class="field-name anchored">locations (<code><a href="../../enum/__directivelocation.html">[__DirectiveLocation!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="args" class="field-name anchored">args (<code><a href="../__inputvalue.html">[__InputValue!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">includeDeprecated</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
       <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="onoperation" class="field-name anchored">onOperation (<code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>

<html lang="en">

    <title>__EnumValue</title>

    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="__enumvalue" class="anchor" href="__enumvalue.html#__enumvalue" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__EnumValue</h1>
<p>One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="__enumvalue.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="isdeprecated" class="field-name anchored">isDeprecated (<code><a href="../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="deprecationreason" class="field-name anchored">deprecationReason (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/__enumvalue/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__EnumValue GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__EnumValue</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="__enumvalue" class="anchor" href="../__enumvalue.html#__enumvalue" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__EnumValue</h1>
<p>One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../__enumvalue.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="isdeprecated" class="field-name anchored">isDeprecated (<code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="deprecationreason" class="field-name anchored">deprecationReason (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/__field.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__Field GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__Field</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="__field" class="anchor" href="__field.html#__field" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__Field</h1>
<p>Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="__field.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="args" class="field-name anchored">args (<code><a href="__inputvalue.html">[__InputValue!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">includeDeprecated</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
       <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="type" class="field-name anchored">type (<code><a href="__type.html">__Type!</a></code>)</span>

</div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__Field GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__Field</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="__field" class="anchor" href="../__field.html#__field" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__Field</h1>
<p>Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../__field.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>

<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="args" class="field-name anchored">args (<code><a href="../__inputvalue.html">[__InputValue!]!</a></code>)</span>

  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>

  <td><code class="anchored">includeDeprecated</code></td>

    <code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean</a></code>

       <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__InputValue GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__InputValue</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
