        <h1>
<a id="__inputvalue" class="anchor" href="__inputvalue.html#__inputvalue" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__InputValue</h1>
<p>Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="__inputvalue.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="type" class="field-name anchored">type (<code><a href="__type.html">__Type!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="defaultvalue" class="field-name anchored">defaultValue (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.</p>
  </div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/__inputvalue/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__InputValue GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__InputValue</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="__inputvalue" class="anchor" href="../__inputvalue.html#__inputvalue" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__InputValue</h1>
<p>Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../__inputvalue.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="type" class="field-name anchored">type (<code><a href="../__type.html">__Type!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="defaultvalue" class="field-name anchored">defaultValue (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="isdeprecated" class="field-name anchored">isDeprecated (<code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>

  <span id="deprecationreason" class="field-name anchored">deprecationReason (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__Schema GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__Schema</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="__schema" class="anchor" href="index.html#__schema" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__Schema</h1>
<p>A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="index.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="types" class="field-name anchored">types (<code><a href="../__type.html">[__Type!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of all types supported by this server.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="querytype" class="field-name anchored">queryType (<code><a href="../__type.html">__Type!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The type that query operations will be rooted at.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="mutationtype" class="field-name anchored">mutationType (<code><a href="../__type.html">__Type</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="subscriptiontype" class="field-name anchored">subscriptionType (<code><a href="../__type.html">__Type</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="directives" class="field-name anchored">directives (<code><a href="../__directive.html">[__Directive!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of all directives supported by this server.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__Type GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__Type</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="__type" class="anchor" href="__type.html#__type" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__Type</h1>
<p>The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the <code>__TypeKind</code> enum.</p>
<p>Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name and description, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="__type.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="kind" class="field-name anchored">kind (<code><a href="../enum/__typekind.html">__TypeKind!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="fields" class="field-name anchored">fields (<code><a href="__field.html">[__Field!]</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">includeDeprecated</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
       <p>The default value is <code>false</code>.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="interfaces" class="field-name anchored">interfaces (<code><a href="__type.html">[__Type!]</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="possibletypes" class="field-name anchored">possibleTypes (<code><a href="__type.html">[__Type!]</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="__Type GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>__Type</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="__type" class="anchor" href="../__type.html#__type" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>__Type</h1>
<p>The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the <code>__TypeKind</code> enum.</p>
<p>Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name and description, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../__type.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="kind" class="field-name anchored">kind (<code><a href="../../enum/__typekind.html">__TypeKind!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>

  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>

  </div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Collection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Collection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

      <div id="header">

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="collection" class="anchor" href="collection.html#collection" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Collection</h1>
<p>A collection of posts.</p>
<h2>
<a id="implements" class="anchor" href="collection.html#implements" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Implements</h2>
<ul>
   <li><code><a href="../interface/topicableinterface.html">TopicableInterface</a></code></li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="connections" class="anchor" href="collection.html#connections" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Connections</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="posts" class="field-name connection-name anchored">posts (<code><a href="postconnection.html">PostConnection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Lookup posts which are part of the collection.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">after</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">before</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">first</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">last</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="topics" class="field-name connection-name anchored">topics (<code><a href="topicconnection.html">TopicConnection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Look up topics that are associated with the object.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">after</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">before</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">first</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">last</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="collection.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="coverimage" class="field-name anchored">coverImage (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Cover image for the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="createdat" class="field-name anchored">createdAt (<code><a href="../scalar/datetime.html">DateTime!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Identifies the date and time when collection was created.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Description of the collection in plain text.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="featuredat" class="field-name anchored">featuredAt (<code><a href="../scalar/datetime.html">DateTime</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Identifies the date and time when collection was featured.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="followerscount" class="field-name anchored">followersCount (<code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Number of users following the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="id" class="field-name anchored">id (<code><a href="../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="isfollowing" class="field-name anchored">isFollowing (<code><a href="../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Whether the viewer is following the collection or not.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Name of the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="tagline" class="field-name anchored">tagline (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Tagline of the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="url" class="field-name anchored">url (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Public URL of the goal.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="user" class="field-name anchored">user (<code><a href="user.html">User!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>User who created the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="userid" class="field-name anchored">userId (<code><a href="../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of User who created the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/collection/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Collection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Collection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

        <h1>
<a id="collection" class="anchor" href="../collection.html#collection" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Collection</h1>
<p>A collection of posts.</p>
<h2>
<a id="implements" class="anchor" href="../collection.html#implements" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Implements</h2>
<ul>
   <li><code><a href="../../interface/topicableinterface.html">TopicableInterface</a></code></li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="connections" class="anchor" href="../collection.html#connections" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Connections</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="posts" class="field-name connection-name anchored">posts (<code><a href="../postconnection.html">PostConnection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Lookup posts which are part of the collection.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">after</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">before</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">first</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">last</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="topics" class="field-name connection-name anchored">topics (<code><a href="../topicconnection.html">TopicConnection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Look up topics that are associated with the object.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">after</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">before</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">first</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">last</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../collection.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="coverimage" class="field-name anchored">coverImage (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Cover image for the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="createdat" class="field-name anchored">createdAt (<code><a href="../../scalar/datetime.html">DateTime!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Identifies the date and time when collection was created.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Description of the collection in plain text.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="featuredat" class="field-name anchored">featuredAt (<code><a href="../../scalar/datetime.html">DateTime</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Identifies the date and time when collection was featured.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="followerscount" class="field-name anchored">followersCount (<code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Number of users following the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="id" class="field-name anchored">id (<code><a href="../../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="isfollowing" class="field-name anchored">isFollowing (<code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Whether the viewer is following the collection or not.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Name of the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="tagline" class="field-name anchored">tagline (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Tagline of the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="url" class="field-name anchored">url (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Public URL of the goal.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="user" class="field-name anchored">user (<code><a href="../user.html">User!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>User who created the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="userid" class="field-name anchored">userId (<code><a href="../../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of User who created the collection.</p>
  </div>
</div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="CollectionConnection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>CollectionConnection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="collectionconnection" class="anchor" href="collectionconnection.html#collectionconnection" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>CollectionConnection</h1>
<p>The connection type for Collection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="collectionconnection.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="edges" class="field-name anchored">edges (<code><a href="collectionedge.html">[CollectionEdge!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of edges.</p>
  </div>

  <span id="nodes" class="field-name anchored">nodes (<code><a href="collection.html">[Collection!]!</a></code>)</span>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/collectionconnection/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="CollectionConnection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>CollectionConnection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="edges" class="field-name anchored">edges (<code><a href="../collectionedge.html">[CollectionEdge!]!</a></code>)</span>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="CollectionEdge GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>CollectionEdge</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="collectionedge" class="anchor" href="collectionedge.html#collectionedge" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>CollectionEdge</h1>
<p>An edge in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="collectionedge.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="cursor" class="field-name anchored">cursor (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="collection.html">Collection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/collectionedge/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="CollectionEdge GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>CollectionEdge</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <a href="../../directive/oneof/index.html" class="sidebar-link">
          oneOf

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="collectionedge" class="anchor" href="../collectionedge.html#collectionedge" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>CollectionEdge</h1>
<p>An edge in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../collectionedge.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="cursor" class="field-name anchored">cursor (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="../collection.html">Collection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
  </div>
</div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/comment.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Comment GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Comment</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="comment" class="anchor" href="comment.html#comment" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Comment</h1>
<p>A comment posted by a User.</p>
<h2>
<a id="implements" class="anchor" href="comment.html#implements" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Implements</h2>
<ul>
   <li><code><a href="../interface/votableinterface.html">VotableInterface</a></code></li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="connections" class="anchor" href="comment.html#connections" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Connections</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="replies" class="field-name connection-name anchored">replies (<code><a href="commentconnection.html">CommentConnection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Lookup comments that were posted on the comment itself.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">after</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">before</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">first</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">last</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">order</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../enum/commentsorder.html">CommentsOrder</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Define order for the Comments.</p>
       <p>The default value is <code>NEWEST</code>.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>

<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="comment.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="body" class="field-name anchored">body (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Body of the comment.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="createdat" class="field-name anchored">createdAt (<code><a href="../scalar/datetime.html">DateTime!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Identifies the date and time when comment was created.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="id" class="field-name anchored">id (<code><a href="../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the comment.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="isvoted" class="field-name anchored">isVoted (<code><a href="../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Whether the Viewer has voted for the object or not.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="parent" class="field-name anchored">parent (<code><a href="comment.html">Comment</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Comment on which this comment was posted(null in case of top level comments).</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="parentid" class="field-name anchored">parentId (<code><a href="../scalar/id.html">ID</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of Comment on which this comment was posted(null in case of top level comments).</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="url" class="field-name anchored">url (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Public URL of the comment.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="user" class="field-name anchored">user (<code><a href="user.html">User!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>User who posted the comment.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="userid" class="field-name anchored">userId (<code><a href="../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of User who posted the comment.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="votescount" class="field-name anchored">votesCount (<code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Number of votes that the object has currently.</p>
  </div>
</div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Comment GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Comment</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

        <h1>
<a id="comment" class="anchor" href="../comment.html#comment" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Comment</h1>
<p>A comment posted by a User.</p>
<h2>
<a id="implements" class="anchor" href="../comment.html#implements" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Implements</h2>
<ul>
   <li><code><a href="../../interface/votableinterface.html">VotableInterface</a></code></li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="connections" class="anchor" href="../comment.html#connections" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Connections</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="replies" class="field-name connection-name anchored">replies (<code><a href="../commentconnection.html">CommentConnection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Lookup comments that were posted on the comment itself.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">after</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">before</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">first</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">last</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">order</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../enum/commentsorder.html">CommentsOrder</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Define order for the Comments.</p>
       <p>The default value is <code>NEWEST</code>.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="votes" class="field-name connection-name anchored">votes (<code><a href="../voteconnection.html">VoteConnection!</a></code>)</span>

<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../comment.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="body" class="field-name anchored">body (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Body of the comment.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="createdat" class="field-name anchored">createdAt (<code><a href="../../scalar/datetime.html">DateTime!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Identifies the date and time when comment was created.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="id" class="field-name anchored">id (<code><a href="../../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the comment.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="isvoted" class="field-name anchored">isVoted (<code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Whether the Viewer has voted for the object or not.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="parent" class="field-name anchored">parent (<code><a href="../comment.html">Comment</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Comment on which this comment was posted(null in case of top level comments).</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="parentid" class="field-name anchored">parentId (<code><a href="../../scalar/id.html">ID</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of Comment on which this comment was posted(null in case of top level comments).</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="url" class="field-name anchored">url (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Public URL of the comment.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="user" class="field-name anchored">user (<code><a href="../user.html">User!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>User who posted the comment.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="userid" class="field-name anchored">userId (<code><a href="../../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of User who posted the comment.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="votescount" class="field-name anchored">votesCount (<code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Number of votes that the object has currently.</p>
  </div>
</div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/commentconnection.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="CommentConnection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>CommentConnection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

      <div id="header">

</div>

  <li>
    <p><a href="../operation/query.html">Queries</a></p>
    <ul class="menu-root">
      
      
      <li>
        <a href="../query/collection/index.html" class="sidebar-link">
          collection
        </a>
      </li>
      
      
      <li>
        <a href="../query/collections/index.html" class="sidebar-link">
          collections
        </a>
      </li>
      
      
      <li>
        <a href="../query/comment/index.html" class="sidebar-link">

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="commentconnection" class="anchor" href="commentconnection.html#commentconnection" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>CommentConnection</h1>
<p>The connection type for Comment.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="commentconnection.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="edges" class="field-name anchored">edges (<code><a href="commentedge.html">[CommentEdge!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of edges.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="nodes" class="field-name anchored">nodes (<code><a href="comment.html">[Comment!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of nodes.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="pageinfo" class="field-name anchored">pageInfo (<code><a href="pageinfo.html">PageInfo!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Information to aid in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="totalcount" class="field-name anchored">totalCount (<code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Total number of objects returned from this query</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/commentconnection/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="CommentConnection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>CommentConnection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>

  <span id="edges" class="field-name anchored">edges (<code><a href="../commentedge.html">[CommentEdge!]!</a></code>)</span>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/commentedge.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="CommentEdge GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>CommentEdge</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="commentedge" class="anchor" href="commentedge.html#commentedge" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>CommentEdge</h1>
<p>An edge in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="commentedge.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="cursor" class="field-name anchored">cursor (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="comment.html">Comment!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
