<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="CommentEdge GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>CommentEdge</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="commentedge" class="anchor" href="../commentedge.html#commentedge" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>CommentEdge</h1>
<p>An edge in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../commentedge.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="cursor" class="field-name anchored">cursor (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="../comment.html">Comment!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/error.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Error GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Error</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="error" class="anchor" href="error.html#error" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Error</h1>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="error.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="field" class="field-name anchored">field (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Field for which the error occurred.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="message" class="field-name anchored">message (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Error message.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/error/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Error GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Error</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="error" class="anchor" href="../error.html#error" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Error</h1>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../error.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="field" class="field-name anchored">field (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Field for which the error occurred.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="message" class="field-name anchored">message (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Error message.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/media.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Media GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Media</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

        <h1>
<a id="media" class="anchor" href="media.html#media" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Media</h1>

<h2>

   <p>Type of media object.</p>
  </div>

  <span id="url" class="field-name anchored">url (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Public URL for the media object. Incase of videos this URL represents thumbnail generated from video.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">height</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Set height of the image to given value.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">width</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Set width of the image to given value.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/media/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Media GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Media</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="PageInfo GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>PageInfo</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="pageinfo" class="anchor" href="pageinfo.html#pageinfo" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>PageInfo</h1>
<p>Information about pagination in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="pageinfo.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="endcursor" class="field-name anchored">endCursor (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>When paginating forwards, the cursor to continue.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="hasnextpage" class="field-name anchored">hasNextPage (<code><a href="../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>When paginating forwards, are there more items?</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="haspreviouspage" class="field-name anchored">hasPreviousPage (<code><a href="../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>When paginating backwards, are there more items?</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="startcursor" class="field-name anchored">startCursor (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>When paginating backwards, the cursor to continue.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/pageinfo/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="PageInfo GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>PageInfo</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="pageinfo" class="anchor" href="../pageinfo.html#pageinfo" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>PageInfo</h1>
<p>Information about pagination in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../pageinfo.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="endcursor" class="field-name anchored">endCursor (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>When paginating forwards, the cursor to continue.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="hasnextpage" class="field-name anchored">hasNextPage (<code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>When paginating forwards, are there more items?</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="haspreviouspage" class="field-name anchored">hasPreviousPage (<code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>When paginating backwards, are there more items?</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="startcursor" class="field-name anchored">startCursor (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>When paginating backwards, the cursor to continue.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/post.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Post GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Post</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="post" class="anchor" href="post.html#post" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Post</h1>
<p>A post.</p>
<h2>
<a id="implements" class="anchor" href="post.html#implements" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Implements</h2>

<h2>

<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="collections" class="field-name connection-name anchored">collections (<code><a href="collectionconnection.html">CollectionConnection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Lookup collections which the Post is part of.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">after</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">before</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">first</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">last</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="post.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="commentscount" class="field-name anchored">commentsCount (<code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Number of comments made on the Post.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="createdat" class="field-name anchored">createdAt (<code><a href="../scalar/datetime.html">DateTime!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Identifies the date and time when the Post was created.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Description of the Post in plain text.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="featuredat" class="field-name anchored">featuredAt (<code><a href="../scalar/datetime.html">DateTime</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Identifies the date and time when the Post was featured.</p>
  </div>
</div>

  <span id="id" class="field-name anchored">id (<code><a href="../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the Post.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="iscollected" class="field-name anchored">isCollected (<code><a href="../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Whether the viewer has added the Post to one of their collections.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="isvoted" class="field-name anchored">isVoted (<code><a href="../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Whether the Viewer has voted for the object or not.</p>
  </div>
</div>

  <span id="makers" class="field-name anchored">makers (<code><a href="user.html">[User!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Users who are marked as makers of the Post.</p>
  </div>
</div>

  <span id="media" class="field-name anchored">media (<code><a href="media.html">[Media!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Media items for the Post.</p>
  </div>
</div>

  <div class="description-wrapper">

  </div>
</div>

  </div>

  </div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/post/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Post GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Post</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="post" class="anchor" href="../post.html#post" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Post</h1>
<p>A post.</p>
<h2>
<a id="implements" class="anchor" href="../post.html#implements" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Implements</h2>
<ul>
   <li><code><a href="../../interface/topicableinterface.html">TopicableInterface</a></code></li>
   <li><code><a href="../../interface/votableinterface.html">VotableInterface</a></code></li>
</ul>
<h2>
<a id="connections" class="anchor" href="../post.html#connections" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Connections</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="collections" class="field-name connection-name anchored">collections (<code><a href="../collectionconnection.html">CollectionConnection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Lookup collections which the Post is part of.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">after</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">before</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">first</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">last</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>

  <td><code class="anchored">first</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">last</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="votes" class="field-name connection-name anchored">votes (<code><a href="../voteconnection.html">VoteConnection!</a></code>)</span>

   </td>

<h2>

<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="commentscount" class="field-name anchored">commentsCount (<code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Number of comments made on the Post.</p>
  </div>
</div>

  </div>

  </div>

  </div>

  </div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="PostConnection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>PostConnection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="postconnection" class="anchor" href="postconnection.html#postconnection" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>PostConnection</h1>
<p>The connection type for Post.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="postconnection.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="edges" class="field-name anchored">edges (<code><a href="postedge.html">[PostEdge!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of edges.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="nodes" class="field-name anchored">nodes (<code><a href="post.html">[Post!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of nodes.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="pageinfo" class="field-name anchored">pageInfo (<code><a href="pageinfo.html">PageInfo!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Information to aid in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="totalcount" class="field-name anchored">totalCount (<code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Total number of objects returned from this query</p>
  </div>
</div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="PostConnection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>PostConnection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="postconnection" class="anchor" href="../postconnection.html#postconnection" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>PostConnection</h1>
<p>The connection type for Post.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../postconnection.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="edges" class="field-name anchored">edges (<code><a href="../postedge.html">[PostEdge!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of edges.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="nodes" class="field-name anchored">nodes (<code><a href="../post.html">[Post!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of nodes.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="pageinfo" class="field-name anchored">pageInfo (<code><a href="../pageinfo.html">PageInfo!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Information to aid in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="totalcount" class="field-name anchored">totalCount (<code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Total number of objects returned from this query</p>
  </div>
</div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="PostEdge GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>PostEdge</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="postedge" class="anchor" href="postedge.html#postedge" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>PostEdge</h1>
<p>An edge in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="postedge.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="cursor" class="field-name anchored">cursor (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="post.html">Post!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/postedge/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="PostEdge GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>PostEdge</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="postedge" class="anchor" href="../postedge.html#postedge" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>PostEdge</h1>
<p>An edge in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../postedge.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="cursor" class="field-name anchored">cursor (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="../post.html">Post!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
  </div>
</div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/productlink.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="ProductLink GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>ProductLink</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

        <h1>
<a id="productlink" class="anchor" href="productlink.html#productlink" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>ProductLink</h1>
<p>Product link from a post.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="productlink.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="type" class="field-name anchored">type (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="url" class="field-name anchored">url (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/productlink/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="ProductLink GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>ProductLink</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="productlink" class="anchor" href="../productlink.html#productlink" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>ProductLink</h1>
<p>Product link from a post.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../productlink.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>

  <span id="type" class="field-name anchored">type (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>

  <span id="url" class="field-name anchored">url (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/topic.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Topic GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Topic</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="topic" class="anchor" href="topic.html#topic" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Topic</h1>
<p>A topic.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="topic.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="createdat" class="field-name anchored">createdAt (<code><a href="../scalar/datetime.html">DateTime!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Identifies the date and time when topic was created.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Description of the topic.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="followerscount" class="field-name anchored">followersCount (<code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Number of users who are following the topic.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="id" class="field-name anchored">id (<code><a href="../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the topic.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="image" class="field-name anchored">image (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Image of the topic.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">height</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">width</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="isfollowing" class="field-name anchored">isFollowing (<code><a href="../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Whether the viewer is following the topic or not.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Name of the topic.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="postscount" class="field-name anchored">postsCount (<code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Number of posts that are part of the topic.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="slug" class="field-name anchored">slug (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>

  </div>
</div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Topic GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Topic</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="topic" class="anchor" href="../topic.html#topic" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Topic</h1>
<p>A topic.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../topic.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="createdat" class="field-name anchored">createdAt (<code><a href="../../scalar/datetime.html">DateTime!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Identifies the date and time when topic was created.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="description" class="field-name anchored">description (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Description of the topic.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="followerscount" class="field-name anchored">followersCount (<code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Number of users who are following the topic.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="id" class="field-name anchored">id (<code><a href="../../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the topic.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="image" class="field-name anchored">image (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Image of the topic.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">height</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">width</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="isfollowing" class="field-name anchored">isFollowing (<code><a href="../../scalar/boolean.html">Boolean!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Whether the viewer is following the topic or not.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="name" class="field-name anchored">name (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Name of the topic.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="postscount" class="field-name anchored">postsCount (<code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Number of posts that are part of the topic.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="slug" class="field-name anchored">slug (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>URL friendly slug of the topic.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="url" class="field-name anchored">url (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Public URL of the topic.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/topicconnection.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="TopicConnection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>TopicConnection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/topicconnection/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="TopicConnection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>TopicConnection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
