<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="TopicEdge GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>TopicEdge</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="topicedge" class="anchor" href="topicedge.html#topicedge" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>TopicEdge</h1>
<p>An edge in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="topicedge.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="cursor" class="field-name anchored">cursor (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="topic.html">Topic!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/topicedge/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="TopicEdge GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>TopicEdge</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="topicedge" class="anchor" href="../topicedge.html#topicedge" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>TopicEdge</h1>
<p>An edge in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../topicedge.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="cursor" class="field-name anchored">cursor (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="../topic.html">Topic!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>

    </div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/user.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="User GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>User</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

      <div id="header">

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="user" class="anchor" href="user.html#user" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>User</h1>
<p>A user. The data is only available for the currently-accessing user, otherwise
all of it will be redacted to protect other users' privacy.</p>
<h2>
<a id="connections" class="anchor" href="user.html#connections" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Connections</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="followedcollections" class="field-name connection-name anchored">followedCollections (<code><a href="collectionconnection.html">CollectionConnection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Look up collections that the user is following.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>

  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">before</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">first</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">last</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="createdat" class="field-name anchored">createdAt (<code><a href="../scalar/datetime.html">DateTime!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Identifies the date and time when user was created.</p>
  </div>
</div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="User GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>User</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="user" class="anchor" href="../user.html#user" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>User</h1>
<p>A user. The data is only available for the currently-accessing user, otherwise
all of it will be redacted to protect other users' privacy.</p>
<h2>
<a id="connections" class="anchor" href="../user.html#connections" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Connections</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="followedcollections" class="field-name connection-name anchored">followedCollections (<code><a href="../collectionconnection.html">CollectionConnection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Look up collections that the user is following.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>
    <th>Description</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">after</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">before</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified cursor.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">first</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the first <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td><code class="anchored">last</code></td>
  <td>
    <code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int</a></code>
  </td>
  <td>
    <p>Returns the last <em>n</em> elements from the list.</p>
   </td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
  </div>
</div>

</table>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="submittedposts" class="field-name connection-name anchored">submittedPosts (<code><a href="../postconnection.html">PostConnection!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Look up posts that the user has submitted.</p>
     <table class="arguments">
  <thead>
  <tr>
    <th>Argument</th>
    <th>Type</th>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="UserConnection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>UserConnection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="userconnection" class="anchor" href="userconnection.html#userconnection" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>UserConnection</h1>
<p>The connection type for User.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="userconnection.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="edges" class="field-name anchored">edges (<code><a href="useredge.html">[UserEdge!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of edges.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="nodes" class="field-name anchored">nodes (<code><a href="user.html">[User!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of nodes.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="pageinfo" class="field-name anchored">pageInfo (<code><a href="pageinfo.html">PageInfo!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Information to aid in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="totalcount" class="field-name anchored">totalCount (<code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Total number of objects returned from this query</p>
  </div>
</div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="UserConnection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>UserConnection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="userconnection" class="anchor" href="../userconnection.html#userconnection" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>UserConnection</h1>
<p>The connection type for User.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../userconnection.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="edges" class="field-name anchored">edges (<code><a href="../useredge.html">[UserEdge!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of edges.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="nodes" class="field-name anchored">nodes (<code><a href="../user.html">[User!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of nodes.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="pageinfo" class="field-name anchored">pageInfo (<code><a href="../pageinfo.html">PageInfo!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Information to aid in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="totalcount" class="field-name anchored">totalCount (<code><a href="../../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Total number of objects returned from this query</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="UserEdge GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>UserEdge</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="useredge" class="anchor" href="useredge.html#useredge" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>UserEdge</h1>
<p>An edge in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="useredge.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="cursor" class="field-name anchored">cursor (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="user.html">User!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/useredge/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="UserEdge GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>UserEdge</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="useredge" class="anchor" href="../useredge.html#useredge" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>UserEdge</h1>
<p>An edge in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../useredge.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="cursor" class="field-name anchored">cursor (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="../user.html">User!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="UserFollowPayload GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>UserFollowPayload</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="userfollowpayload" class="anchor" href="index.html#userfollowpayload" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>UserFollowPayload</h1>
<p>Autogenerated return type of UserFollow.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="index.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="clientmutationid" class="field-name anchored">clientMutationId (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A unique identifier for the client performing the mutation.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="errors" class="field-name anchored">errors (<code><a href="../error.html">[Error!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="../user.html">User</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/userfollowundopayload/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="UserFollowUndoPayload GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>UserFollowUndoPayload</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="userfollowundopayload" class="anchor" href="index.html#userfollowundopayload" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>UserFollowUndoPayload</h1>
<p>Autogenerated return type of UserFollowUndo.</p>
<h2>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/viewer/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Viewer GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Viewer</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="viewer" class="anchor" href="index.html#viewer" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Viewer</h1>
<p>Top level scope for the user in whose context the API is running.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="index.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="user" class="field-name anchored">user (<code><a href="../user.html">User!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>User who is the viewer of the API.</p>
  </div>
</div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Vote GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Vote</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }

        <h1>
<a id="vote" class="anchor" href="vote.html#vote" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Vote</h1>

<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="vote.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="createdat" class="field-name anchored">createdAt (<code><a href="../scalar/datetime.html">DateTime!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Identifies the date and time when Vote was created.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="id" class="field-name anchored">id (<code><a href="../scalar/id.html">ID!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>ID of the Vote.</p>
  </div>

  <span id="user" class="field-name anchored">user (<code><a href="user.html">User!</a></code>)</span>

  </div>
</div>

  </div>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/vote/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="Vote GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>Vote</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="VoteConnection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>VoteConnection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

        <h1>
<a id="voteconnection" class="anchor" href="voteconnection.html#voteconnection" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>VoteConnection</h1>
<p>The connection type for Vote.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="voteconnection.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="edges" class="field-name anchored">edges (<code><a href="voteedge.html">[VoteEdge!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of edges.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="nodes" class="field-name anchored">nodes (<code><a href="vote.html">[Vote!]!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A list of nodes.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="pageinfo" class="field-name anchored">pageInfo (<code><a href="pageinfo.html">PageInfo!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Information to aid in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="totalcount" class="field-name anchored">totalCount (<code><a href="../scalar/int.html">Int!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>Total number of objects returned from this query</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/voteconnection/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="VoteConnection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>VoteConnection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

        <h1>
<a id="voteconnection" class="anchor" href="../voteconnection.html#voteconnection" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>VoteConnection</h1>

  <span id="edges" class="field-name anchored">edges (<code><a href="../voteedge.html">[VoteEdge!]!</a></code>)</span>

===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/object/voteedge.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="VoteEdge GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>VoteEdge</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="voteedge" class="anchor" href="voteedge.html#voteedge" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>VoteEdge</h1>
<p>An edge in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="voteedge.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="cursor" class="field-name anchored">cursor (<code><a href="../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="vote.html">Vote!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="VoteEdge GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>VoteEdge</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>

        <h1>
<a id="voteedge" class="anchor" href="../voteedge.html#voteedge" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>VoteEdge</h1>
<p>An edge in a connection.</p>
<h2>
<a id="fields" class="anchor" href="../voteedge.html#fields" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Fields</h2>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="cursor" class="field-name anchored">cursor (<code><a href="../../scalar/string.html">String!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>A cursor for use in pagination.</p>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="field-entry ">
  <span id="node" class="field-name anchored">node (<code><a href="../vote.html">Vote!</a></code>)</span>
  <div class="description-wrapper">
   <p>The item at the end of the edge.</p>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/operation/mutation.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="mutation GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>mutation</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="mutations" class="anchor" href="mutation.html#mutations" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Mutations</h1>
<p>Every GraphQL schema has a root type for both queries and mutations.</p>
<p>The mutation type defines how GraphQL operations change data. It is analogous to performing HTTP verbs such as <code>POST</code>, <code>PATCH</code>, and <code>DELETE</code>.</p>
<p>For more information, see <a href="http://spec.graphql.org/draft/#sec-Type-System">the GraphQL spec</a>.</p>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/operation/mutation/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="mutation GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>mutation</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>
  <body>

      <div id="header">

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="mutations" class="anchor" href="../mutation.html#mutations" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Mutations</h1>
<p>Every GraphQL schema has a root type for both queries and mutations.</p>
<p>The mutation type defines how GraphQL operations change data. It is analogous to performing HTTP verbs such as <code>POST</code>, <code>PATCH</code>, and <code>DELETE</code>.</p>
<p>For more information, see <a href="http://spec.graphql.org/draft/#sec-Type-System">the GraphQL spec</a>.</p>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>

    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }

      <div id="content">

        <h1>
<a id="query" class="anchor" href="query.html#query" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Query</h1>
<p>Every GraphQL schema has a root type for both queries and mutations.</p>
<p>The query type defines GraphQL operations that retrieve data from the server.</p>
<p>For more information, see <a href="http://spec.graphql.org/draft/#sec-Type-System">the GraphQL spec</a>.</p>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>
        <a class="logo" href="../index.html">

        </a>
      </div>
      <div id="mobile-shade"></div>

    </div>

  </body>
</html>


===== FILE START: /var/folders/z9/yr58561n1rj8_lqtzwkjt24m0000gp/T/tmp.Woa6hsTHyY/api-v2-docs.producthunt.com.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/operation/query/index.html =====

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="query GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>query</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
    </script>
  </head>

        <h1>
<a id="query" class="anchor" href="../query.html#query" aria-hidden="true"><span aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Query</h1>
<p>Every GraphQL schema has a root type for both queries and mutations.</p>
<p>The query type defines GraphQL operations that retrieve data from the server.</p>
<p>For more information, see <a href="http://spec.graphql.org/draft/#sec-Type-System">the GraphQL spec</a>.</p>

      </div>

      <!-- mobile only -->
      <div id="mobile-header">
        <a class="menu-button" onclick="document.body.classList.toggle('sidebar-open')"></a>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="description" content="collection GraphQL documentation">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title>collection</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../assets/style.css">
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/anchor-js/3.2.2/anchor.min.js"></script>
    <script>

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
      // Add anchors
      anchors.options = {
        placement: 'left',
        visible: 'hover',
        icon: '¶'
      };
      anchors.add('h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .anchored');

      // Add listener for search filter input
      const sidebarDiv = document.getElementById('sidebar');
      const searchDiv = sidebarDiv.querySelector('#search')

      if (searchDiv) {
        const searchInput = searchDiv.querySelector('input');
        const menuElements = sidebarDiv.querySelectorAll('ul.menu-root');

        const listener = debounce((event) => {
          const searchValue = event.target.value;
          applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements)
        }, 500);

        searchInput.addEventListener('input', listener);
      }
    });

    function debounce(func, wait) {
      let timeout;

      return function executedFunction(...args) {
        const later = () => {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          func(...args);
        };

        clearTimeout(timeout);
        timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      };
    }

    function applySearchFilter(searchValue, menuElements) {
      menuElements.forEach(menuElement => {
        const listElements = menuElement.getElementsByTagName('li');
        let hasVisibleElements = false;
        Array.from(listElements).forEach(listElement => {
          let contains = true
          if (searchValue.length > 0) {
            const anchorElement = listElement.querySelector('a');
            const textContent = anchorElement.innerText;
            contains = textContent.toLowerCase().includes(searchValue.toLowerCase());
          }

          // Hide the list element if its text does not contain the search value
          listElement.style.display = contains ? '' : 'none';

          if (contains) {
            hasVisibleElements = true;
          }
        });

        // Hide the entire menu if none of the list items are visible
        const menuParentElement = menuElement.closest('li')
        menuParentElement.style.display = hasVisibleElements ? '' : 'none';
      });
    }
